ch.cern.dod.ui.renderer

Class OverviewTreeRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cern.dod.ui.renderer.OverviewTreeRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.zkoss.zul.TreeitemRenderer

    public class OverviewTreeRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.zkoss.zul.TreeitemRenderer
    Renders rows in the overview tree. It displays all the info and creates the action buttons. It also manages events in case an instance is checked or unchecked and the collective action buttons have to be enabled or disabled.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
